mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Received his letter of 1st about method of converting iron into steel; government gives arts no encouragement except patent for 14 years; he believes manufactures carried on better privately than by government; small arms are only manufactures government undertakes.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1806 March 4, Washington [D.C.] to Jay Marsh, Philadelphia, [Pennsylvania].
